article:
This is a 'list of [[airport]]s in [[South Africa]]', grouped by type and sorted
by location.

South Africa, officially the Republic of South Africa, is a country located at
the southern tip of Africa. It is bordered by the countries of Namibia, Botswana
and Zimbabwe to the north, Mozambique and Swaziland to the east, while Lesotho
is an enclave surrounded by South African territory.

The country is divided into nine provinces, which are subdivided into 52
districts (either metropolitan or district municipalities) and 226 local
municipalities. South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria is the
administrative capital, Cape Town is the legislative capital, and Bloemfontein
is the judicial capital. The largest city in South Africa in Johannesburg.

}} __TOC__
